answer:
Yes. Bypassing causes the encounter to end immediately, which is the trigger condition for Anansi's ability.

Can the Runner use [Hunting Grounds](/en/card/09035) to prevent Anansi's ability?
question:
####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) [UFAQ 21](http://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Council_of_the_Crest_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
If the Runner bypasses Anansi with an encounter bypass ability (e.g. [Inside Job](/en/card/20023)), does Anansi still do 3 net damage?
